title: How to Make M&M Pancakes

steps.headline: Gather your materials.
steps.description: You'll need all the ingredients above, as well as a whisk, measuring cups, a bowl, a flipper, and a griddle/pan to cook the pancakes on.

steps.headline: Heat up the griddle.
steps.description: If you have a pancake griddle, turn it on so that it has time to heat up. If you're using a pan, heat up the stove top.

steps.headline: Put the Bisquick in a bowl.
steps.description: Measure 1 cup of Bisquick (or your favourite pancake mix) and put it into a glass bowl.

steps.headline: Add the milk.
steps.description: Measure a 1/2 cup of milk and add it into the bowl of Bisquick.

steps.headline: Crack an egg.
steps.description: Crack an egg into the bowl of milk and the pancake mix.

steps.headline: Whisk it.
steps.description: Whisk the contents of the glass bowl until it's thoroughly blended and has a nice consistency.

steps.headline: Spoon the mix onto the griddle.
steps.description: Use a soup ladle or spoon of your choice and scoop a few spoonfuls of mix onto the griddle.

steps.headline: Add the M&Ms.
steps.description: Grab a handful of M&Ms and sprinkle them onto the pancakes.

steps.headline: Flip the pancakes.
steps.description: Once you think the pancakes are ready, flip them over and let them cook on the other side. Once they've cooked, put them on a plate and enjoy.

text: Gather your materials. You'll need all the ingredients above, as well as a whisk, measuring cups, a bowl, a flipper, and a griddle/pan to cook the pancakes on. Heat up the griddle. If you have a pancake griddle, turn it on so that it has time to heat up. If you're using a pan, heat up the stove top. Put the Bisquick in a bowl. Measure 1 cup of Bisquick (or your favourite pancake mix) and put it into a glass bowl. Add the milk. Measure a 1/2 cup of milk and add it into the bowl of Bisquick. Crack an egg. Crack an egg into the bowl of milk and the pancake mix. Whisk it. Whisk the contents of the glass bowl until it's thoroughly blended and has a nice consistency. Spoon the mix onto the griddle. Use a soup ladle or spoon of your choice and scoop a few spoonfuls of mix onto the griddle. Add the M&Ms. Grab a handful of M&Ms and sprinkle them onto the pancakes. Flip the pancakes. Once you think the pancakes are ready, flip them over and let them cook on the other side. Once they've cooked, put them on a plate and enjoy. Finished.
